title: Shuudengo, Capsule Hotel de, Joushi ni Binetsu Tsutawaru Yoru.
synopsis: The anime centers on Minori, an office worker, and her boss Hadano, who are constantly arguing with each other. One night, after a company drinking party, Minori and Hadano are having their usual argument, when Minori realizes that she has missed the last train. They decide to spend the night at a nearby capsule hotel, but an incident forces them to share the same unit.
related_anime: ['Shuudengo, Capsule Hotel de, Joushi ni Binetsu Tsutawaru Yoru.']
staff: [['Araki, Hideki', ['Director']], ['Enomoto, Takahiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Asuka, Yuuzou', ['Script']], ['EIGHT OF TRIANGLE', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
